short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dictionary Bubble (Instant Dictionary): quickly lookup word definitions with audio pronunciation as you browse the web.
short.es: Diccionario Bubble (Diccionario instantáneo): rápidamente buscar definiciones de palabras con pronunciación de audio a medida que…
short.hi: शब्दकोश बुलबुला (त्वरित शब्दकोश): आप जल्दी और आसानी से ऑडियो उच्चारण के साथ शब्द परिभाषाएँ पा सकते हैं।
short.ko: 사전 버블 (즉시 사전): 웹을 탐색 할 때 오디오 발음으로 단어 정의를 빠르게 검색합니다.
short.ru: Словарь пузырь (мгновенный словарь): быстро поиска определений слов с аудио произношения при просмотре веб-страниц.
short.vi: Từ điển Bubble (Instant Dictionary): nhanh chóng tra cứu định nghĩa của từ với âm thanh khi bạn duyệt web.
short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 词典泡泡（即时词典）：在您浏览网页时，快速查找带有音频发音的词定义。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dictionary Bubble / Instant Dictionary

NOTE: Currently only English Dictionary and English Wikipedia are supported.

With this extension, you can:

1)  Double-click any word to view its instant definition in a small pop-up bubble.
2)  Lookup the complete definition of words or phrases using the toolbar dictionary.
3)  Perform lookup for detailed definitions in online dictionary.
4)  One click access to Google search if the word/phrase is not found in dictionary.
5)  More advanced than Google Dictionary.
6)  Works with Google Docs and Microsoft Office 365

IMPORTANT: The bubble will not work in tabs that were open prior to installation; such tabs must be refreshed. Also, note that all extensions are disabled on Chrome Web Store pages (including this page).

Join us:

Google+ - https://plus.google.com/+Goodwordguide

By: GoodWordGuide.com

long.es,hi,ko,ru,vi,zh_CN,zh_TW:
With this extension, you can:

1)  Double-click any word to view its instant definition in a small pop-up bubble.
2)  Lookup the complete definition of words or phrases using the toolbar dictionary.
3)  Perform lookup for detailed definitions in online dictionary.
4)  One click access to Google search if the word/phrase is not found in dictionary.

NOTE: Currently only English Dictionary and English Wikipedia are supported.

IMPORTANT: The bubble will not work in tabs that were open prior to installation; such tabs must be refreshed. Also, note that all extensions are disabled on Chrome Web Store pages (including this page).

Having problems with this extension? Please fill out a problem report at http://goo.gl/Zc5e2
